pullRequest.title: Issue #4352: Added ability to skip CI executions base on commit files i…

beforeCommit.message: Issue #4352: Add ability to skip CI executions base on commit files in codeship.

beforeCommit.message: Issue #4352: Add ability to skip CI executions

afterCommit.message: Issue #4352: Add ability to skip CI executions

nodes.bodyText:
please move this code to https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/codeship-steps.yml
we need to skip only when we are in CI mode. This shell file can be executed at local and it should not skip anything.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,19 +3,25 @@
 #This script is used at https://app.codeship.com/projects/124310
 #Run "firefox target/site/linkcheck.html" after completion to review html report
 
-set -e
-pwd
-uname -a
-mvn --version
-curl -I https://sourceforge.net/projects/checkstyle/
-mvn -e clean site -Dcheckstyle.ant.skip=true -DskipTests -DskipITs \
-   -Dpmd.skip=true -Dspotbugs.skip=true -Djacoco.skip=true -Dcheckstyle.skip=true
-echo "------------ grep of linkcheck.html--BEGIN"
-# "grep ... | cat" is required command is running in "set -e" mode and
-# grep could return exit code 1 if nothing is matching
-grep externalLink target/site/linkcheck.html | cat
-echo "------------ grep of linkcheck.html--END"
-RESULT=$(grep externalLink target/site/linkcheck.html | grep -v 'Read timed out' | wc -l)
-echo 'Exit code:'$RESULT
-if [[ $RESULT != 0 ]]; then false; fi
+# To skip build if minor files or other CI files area changed
+SKIP_FILES=".github|appveyor.yml|circle.yml|distelli-manifest.yml|fast-forward-merge.sh|LICENSE|\
+            LICENSE.apache20|README.md|release.sh|RIGHTS.antlr|shippable.yml|wercker.yml"

nodes.bodyText: please wrap long lines to be less then 100 symbols in length.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -7,4 +7,5 @@
     #-  command: ./.ci/travis/travis.sh site
     #-  command: ./.ci/travis/travis.sh nondex
     -  command: ls -la
-    -  command: .ci/run-link-check-plugin.sh
+    -  command: SKIP_FILES=".github|appveyor.yml|circle.yml|distelli-manifest.yml|fast-forward-merge.sh|LICENSE|LICENSE.apache20|README.md|release.sh|RIGHTS.antlr|shippable.yml|wercker.yml"
+    -  command: if [[ $(git diff --name-only HEAD HEAD~1 | grep -vE "$SKIP_FILES" | cat | wc -c) > 0 ]]; then .ci/run-link-check-plugin.sh; fi

nodes.bodyText:
please use this form  
  
    
      checkstyle/shippable.yml
    
    
         Line 42
      in
      72a5294
    
    
    
    

        
          
                 SKIP_FILES1="appveyor.yml|codeship-*|buddy.yml|circleci|.travis.yml" 
        
    
  


please make single command node with - | as it is done at 
  
    
      checkstyle/shippable.yml
    
    
         Line 32
      in
      72a5294
    
    
    
    

        
          
           - |
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,5 +6,10 @@
   steps:
     #-  command: ./.ci/travis/travis.sh site
     #-  command: ./.ci/travis/travis.sh nondex
-    -  command: ls -la
-    -  command: .ci/run-link-check-plugin.sh
+    - command: ls -la
+    - command: SKIP_FILES=
+        ".github|appveyor.yml|circle.yml|distelli-manifest.yml|fast-forward-merge.sh|LICENSE|

beforeCommit.message: Issue #4352: Add ability to skip CI executions

afterCommit.message: Issue #4352: Add ability to skip CI executions

nodes.bodyText: Please move then and fi to separate lines, we respect indentation rules even in bash
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,5 +6,11 @@
   steps:
     #-  command: ./.ci/travis/travis.sh site
     #-  command: ./.ci/travis/travis.sh nondex
-    -  command: ls -la
-    -  command: .ci/run-link-check-plugin.sh
+    - command: |
+        ls -la
+        SKIP_FILES1=".github|distelli-manifest.yml|fast-forward-merge.sh"
+        SKIP_FILES2="LICENSE|LICENSE.apache20|README.md|release.sh|RIGHTS.antlr"
+        SKIP_FILES3="shippable.yml|wercker.yml|appveyor.yml|circle.yml"
+        SKIP_FILES="$SKIP_FILES1$SKIP_FILES2$SKIP_FILES3"
+        if [[ $(git diff --name-only HEAD HEAD~1 | grep -vE "$SKIP_FILES" | cat | wc -c) > 0 ]];
+        then .ci/run-link-check-plugin.sh; fi

nodes.bodyText:
The rightmost item should be separated from the leftmost on the next line:
SKIP_FILES="$SKIP_FILES1|$SKIP_FILES2|$SKIP_FILES3"
OR
SKIP_FILES1=".github|distelli-manifest.yml|fast-forward-merge.sh|" (and so on)

@@ -6,5 +6,13 @@

     #-  command: ./.ci/travis/travis.sh site
     #-  command: ./.ci/travis/travis.sh nondex
-    -  command: ls -la
-    -  command: .ci/run-link-check-plugin.sh
+    - command: |
+        ls -la
+        SKIP_FILES1=".github|distelli-manifest.yml|fast-forward-merge.sh"
+        SKIP_FILES2="LICENSE|LICENSE.apache20|README.md|release.sh|RIGHTS.antlr"
+        SKIP_FILES3="shippable.yml|wercker.yml|appveyor.yml|circle.yml"
+        SKIP_FILES="$SKIP_FILES1$SKIP_FILES2$SKIP_FILES3"

nodes.bodyText:
@romani Is this safe to do when travis and other CIs dropped this and forced to run all the time?
https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/.travis.yml#L326
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,5 +6,13 @@
   steps:
     #-  command: ./.ci/travis/travis.sh site
     #-  command: ./.ci/travis/travis.sh nondex
-    -  command: ls -la
-    -  command: .ci/run-link-check-plugin.sh
+    - command: |
+        ls -la
+        SKIP_FILES1=".github|distelli-manifest.yml|fast-forward-merge.sh"
+        SKIP_FILES2="LICENSE|LICENSE.apache20|README.md|release.sh|RIGHTS.antlr"
+        SKIP_FILES3="shippable.yml|wercker.yml|appveyor.yml|circle.yml"
+        SKIP_FILES="$SKIP_FILES1|$SKIP_FILES2|$SKIP_FILES3"
+        if [[ $(git diff --name-only HEAD HEAD~1 | grep -vE "$SKIP_FILES" | cat | wc -c) > 0 ]];
